title: A farewell cauld, Churcheyeards, rounde From the courte to the cuntry grownd.
author: Churchyard, Thomas, 1520?-1604.
publisher: In Fletestrte [sic] at the Faucon, ouer againste S. Dunstons Churche, by Wylliam Gryffith,
notes: Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
